16 namespace voxblox {
21 class OccupancyIntegrator {
22  public:
23  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
24 
25  struct Config {
26  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
27 
28  float probability_hit = 0.65f;
29  float probability_miss = 0.4f;
30  float threshold_min = 0.12f;
31  float threshold_max = 0.97f;
32  float threshold_occupancy = 0.7f;
33  FloatingPoint min_ray_length_m = 0.1;
34  FloatingPoint max_ray_length_m = 5.0;
35  };
36 
37  OccupancyIntegrator(const Config& config, Layer<OccupancyVoxel>* layer)
38  : config_(config), layer_(layer) {
39  DCHECK(layer_ != NULL);
40  DCHECK_GT(layer_->voxel_size(), 0.0);
41  DCHECK_GT(layer_->block_size(), 0.0);
42  DCHECK_GT(layer_->voxels_per_side(), 0u);
43 
44  voxel_size_ = layer_->voxel_size();
45  block_size_ = layer_->block_size();
46  voxels_per_side_ = layer_->voxels_per_side();
47 
48  voxel_size_inv_ = 1.0 / voxel_size_;
49  block_size_inv_ = 1.0 / block_size_;
50  voxels_per_side_inv_ = 1.0 / voxels_per_side_;
51 
52  // Cache rest of the probability settings.
53  prob_hit_log_ = logOddsFromProbability(config_.probability_hit);
54  prob_miss_log_ = logOddsFromProbability(config_.probability_miss);
55  clamp_min_log_ = logOddsFromProbability(config_.threshold_min);
56  clamp_max_log_ = logOddsFromProbability(config_.threshold_max);
57  min_occupancy_log_ = logOddsFromProbability(config_.threshold_occupancy);
58  }
59 
60  inline void updateOccupancyVoxel(bool occupied, OccupancyVoxel* occ_voxel) {
61  DCHECK(occ_voxel != NULL);
62  // Set voxel to observed.
63  occ_voxel->observed = true;
64  // Skip update if necessary.
65  float log_odds_update = occupied ? prob_hit_log_ : prob_miss_log_;
66  if ((log_odds_update >= 0 &&
67  occ_voxel->probability_log >= clamp_max_log_) ||
68  (log_odds_update <= 0 &&
69  occ_voxel->probability_log <= clamp_min_log_)) {
70  return;
71  }
72  // Otherwise update and reclamp.
73  occ_voxel->probability_log = std::min(
74  std::max(occ_voxel->probability_log + log_odds_update, clamp_min_log_),
75  clamp_max_log_);
76  }
77 
78  void integratePointCloud(const Transformation& T_G_C,
79  const Pointcloud& points_C) {
80  timing::Timer integrate_timer("integrate_occ");
81 
82  const Point& origin = T_G_C.getPosition();
83 
84  LongIndexSet free_cells;
85  LongIndexSet occupied_cells;
86 
87  const Point start_scaled = origin * voxel_size_inv_;
88  Point end_scaled = Point::Zero();
89 
90  for (size_t pt_idx = 0; pt_idx < points_C.size(); ++pt_idx) {
91  const Point& point_C = points_C[pt_idx];
92  const Point point_G = T_G_C * point_C;
93  const Ray unit_ray = (point_G - origin).normalized();
94 
95  timing::Timer cast_ray_timer("integrate_occ/cast_ray");
96 
97  AlignedVector<GlobalIndex> global_voxel_indices;
98  FloatingPoint ray_distance = (point_G - origin).norm();
99  if (ray_distance < config_.min_ray_length_m) {
100  continue;
101  } else if (ray_distance > config_.max_ray_length_m) {
102  // Simply clear up until the max ray distance in this case.
103  end_scaled =
104  (origin + config_.max_ray_length_m * unit_ray) * voxel_size_inv_;
105 
106  if (free_cells.find(getGridIndexFromPoint<GlobalIndex>(end_scaled)) ==
107  free_cells.end()) {
108  castRay(start_scaled, end_scaled, &global_voxel_indices);
109  free_cells.insert(global_voxel_indices.begin(),
110  global_voxel_indices.end());
111  }
112  } else {
113  end_scaled = point_G * voxel_size_inv_;
114  if (occupied_cells.find(getGridIndexFromPoint<GlobalIndex>(
115  end_scaled)) == occupied_cells.end()) {
116  castRay(start_scaled, end_scaled, &global_voxel_indices);
117 
118  if (global_voxel_indices.size() > 2) {
119  free_cells.insert(global_voxel_indices.begin(),
120  global_voxel_indices.end() - 1);
121  occupied_cells.insert(global_voxel_indices.back());
122  }
123  }
124  }
125  cast_ray_timer.Stop();
126  }
127 
128  timing::Timer update_voxels_timer("integrate_occ/update_occupancy");
129 
130  // Clean up the lists: remove any occupied cells from free cells.
131  for (const GlobalIndex& global_index : occupied_cells) {
132  LongIndexSet::iterator cell_it = free_cells.find(global_index);
133  if (cell_it != free_cells.end()) {
134  free_cells.erase(cell_it);
135  }
136  }
137  // Then actually update the occupancy voxels.
138  BlockIndex last_block_idx = BlockIndex::Zero();
139  Block<OccupancyVoxel>::Ptr block;
140 
141  bool occupied = false;
142  for (const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_idx : free_cells) {
143  BlockIndex block_idx = getBlockIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(
144  global_voxel_idx, voxels_per_side_inv_);
145  VoxelIndex local_voxel_idx =
146  getLocalFromGlobalVoxelIndex(global_voxel_idx, voxels_per_side_);
147 
148  if (!block || block_idx != last_block_idx) {
149  block = layer_->allocateBlockPtrByIndex(block_idx);
150  block->updated() = true;
151  last_block_idx = block_idx;
152  }
153 
154  OccupancyVoxel& occ_voxel = block->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(local_voxel_idx);
155  updateOccupancyVoxel(occupied, &occ_voxel);
156  }
157  block.reset();
158 
159  occupied = true;
160  for (const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_idx : occupied_cells) {
161  BlockIndex block_idx = getBlockIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(
162  global_voxel_idx, voxels_per_side_inv_);
163  VoxelIndex local_voxel_idx =
164  getLocalFromGlobalVoxelIndex(global_voxel_idx, voxels_per_side_);
165 
166  if (!block || block_idx != last_block_idx) {
167  block = layer_->allocateBlockPtrByIndex(block_idx);
168  block->updated() = true;
169  last_block_idx = block_idx;
170  }
171 
172  OccupancyVoxel& occ_voxel = block->getVoxelByVoxelIndex(local_voxel_idx);
173  updateOccupancyVoxel(occupied, &occ_voxel);
174  }
175 
176  update_voxels_timer.Stop();
177  integrate_timer.Stop();
178  }
179 
180  protected:
181  Config config_;
182 
183  Layer<OccupancyVoxel>* layer_;
184 
185  // Cached map config.
186  FloatingPoint voxel_size_;
187  size_t voxels_per_side_;
188  FloatingPoint block_size_;
189 
190  float prob_hit_log_;
191  float prob_miss_log_;
192  float clamp_min_log_;
193  float clamp_max_log_;
194  float min_occupancy_log_;
195 
196  // Derived types.
197  FloatingPoint voxel_size_inv_;
198  FloatingPoint voxels_per_side_inv_;
199  FloatingPoint block_size_inv_;
200 };
